data.title: Kris Jenner Breaks Her Silence on Husband Bruce Jenner's Gender Transition
data.meta_description: Following Bruce Jenner's brave and moving interview with Diane Sawyer late last month, wherein most of Jenner's children from previous relationships were happy to participate in on-screen interviews while members of the Kardashian clan, including the younger Jenners (Kylie and Kendall), steered clear of making public statements until during/after the airing, when they showed unwavering support via social media, Kris Jenner, Bruce's most recent ex-wife, has been fairly quiet on the topic. Until now. In an exclusive clip obtained by the Today show culled from the Keeping Up With the Kardashians episode scheduled to air on E! May 17, Kris Jenner speaks with Kim Kardashian on camera for the first time about Bruce's transition. "I have these memories of this life," Kris says, "and I feel sometimes like it didn't exist." Kardashian, for her part, has shown stoic support for her stepfather through the entire process: "Waking up and feeling like, 'Whoa! This isn't my body. This doesn't feel comfortable,' that's the only way I can kind of imagine it," Kardashian tells her mother. "You really have to let go."
data.text:
Following Bruce Jenner's brave and moving interview with Diane Sawyer late last month, wherein most of Jenner's children from previous relationships were happy to participate in on-screen interviews while members of the Kardashian clan, including the younger Jenners (Kylie and Kendall), steered clear of making public statements until during/after the airing, when they showed unwavering support via social media, Kris Jenner, Bruce's most recent ex-wife, has been fairly quiet on the topic. Until now.

#iframe:http://www.today.com/offsite/kris-jenner-breaks-her-silence-on-bruce-jenners-transition-439055939770|||

In an exclusive clip obtained by the Today show culled from the Keeping Up With the Kardashians episode scheduled to air on E! May 17, Kris Jenner speaks with Kim Kardashian on camera for the first time about Bruce's transition.

"I have these memories of this life," Kris says, "and I feel sometimes like it didn't exist."

Kardashian, for her part, has shown stoic support for her stepfather through the entire process: "Waking up and feeling like, 'Whoa! This isn't my body. This doesn't feel comfortable,' that's the only way I can kind of imagine it," Kardashian tells her mother. "You really have to let go."
